attributes.action: Stop Medway council issuing PCN between the hours of 18:00pm and 08:00am
attributes.background: Residential parking permits are charged to many residents of Medway council and yet parking spaces are insufficient. Thus this has created a system of stealth unfair taxing of the hard working people of Medway.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of Medway Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

http://www.medway.gov.uk/thecouncilanddemocracy/councillorsanddecisions/howtohaveyoursay/petitions.aspx
